@title:Witch Queen campaign weapons

// Empirical Evidence (PvE first choice roll)
// (Polygonal Rifling, Chambered Compensator, Smallbore), (Armor-Piercing Rounds, High-Calibre Rounds, Ricochet Rounds), (Ensemble, Ensemble Enhanced, Pulse Monitor, Pulse Monitor Enhanced, Perpetual Motion, Perpetual Motion Enhanced), any last column trait
//notes:Adamsdown_Boy first choice PvE roll. Shapeable weapon. Sidearms are a... brave choice for endgame PvE as you'll need to be in the danger zone to be doing damage yourself. Bring up the stability with the barrel to open up choices in the magazine that add value in combat. Then a reload perk to maximise uptime and your choice of last column perk depending on preference for damage, healing, super or ability energy. Recommended MW: Stability or Reload Speed with damage-boosting mod.
dimwishlist:item=2607304614&perks=1392496348,1968497646,2621346526
dimwishlist:item=2607304614&perks=3661387068,1968497646,2621346526
dimwishlist:item=2607304614&perks=1482024992,1968497646,2621346526
dimwishlist:item=2607304614&perks=1392496348,1561002382,2621346526

dimwishlist:item=2607304614&perks=1392496348,1885400500,2621346526
dimwishlist:item=2607304614&perks=3661387068,1885400500,2621346526
dimwishlist:item=2607304614&perks=1482024992,1885400500,2621346526
